abstract: Paradoxically, some of the "greenest" buildings in the country are some of the biggest killers of wild birds.
snippet: Paradoxically, some of the "greenest" buildings in the country are some of the biggest killers of wild birds.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design (LEED)

lead_paragraph: Like anyone who feels more at home outside than in, I've spent a considerable portion of my life gazing out windows. (Considerable, I said, not productive).
